page.title: 18STOP-PRESS SUMMER 1985.
page.content:
The Village Hall at E. Preston cont. range and auction room but recently has been renovated. It is now an attractive meeting place with and interesting programme of events.
The Guides in East Preston. Mrs Hoskins started the first company in 1931. Lady Rachel Howard was a Commissioner and guiders met in Arundel Castle. The uniform was a blue dress with a royal blue tie. During the 39-45 war people from Ecclesdon Manor gave the guides chocolate which was difficult to buy. Once when camping, a tramp stole meat from their cooking pot.
The Festival in East Preston. The Village Hall is the focal point for this annual event held in June. Local clubs and societies organise
